hero.title: Labor, Tax and Accounting Consulting Online in the Canary Islands
hero.subtitle: Experience, technology and closeness at the service of your business.
hero.logoAlt: CIE Asesoría - Labor, tax and accounting consulting in the Canary Islands

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer 360º management for freelancers and SMEs, combining technical expertise with the latest technology.

labor.title: Labor
labor.description: Comprehensive payroll management, social security contributions and hiring. Continuous legal-labor advice for your peace of mind.

fiscal.title: Tax
fiscal.description: Efficient tax planning, tax filing and representation before the Tax Agency.

accounting.title: Accounting
accounting.description: Up-to-date accounting, balance sheet analysis and official books. Clear information for decision making.

about.title: Your business,
about.description: We understand your business as a living network. We don't manage isolated documents; we integrate your tax, labor and accounting data to create a global and fluid vision of your activity.

contact.title: Let's Talk About Your Project
contact.description: We're ready to answer your questions. Complete the form and send your inquiry.
contact.privacyLabel: I have read and accept the
contact.privacyLabelEnd: and authorize the processing of my data to respond to this inquiry.

cookies.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookies.description: We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. You can accept all, reject them or configure your preferences. More information in our
cookies.modalDescription: Here you can select which categories of cookies you want to authorize. Technical cookies are necessary for the website to function correctly and cannot be deactivated.

technical.title: Technical and Necessary
technical.description: They allow navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

analytics.title: Analytics and Performance
analytics.description: They help us understand how you interact with the website to improve it (e.g. Google Analytics).

marketing.title: Advertising and Marketing
marketing.description: They allow us to show you personalized advertising based on your browsing habits.

meta.title: Online Consulting in the Canary Islands
meta.description: CIE Asesoría - Canarian online consultancy located in Gran Tarajal. Experts in labor, tax and accounting management.
meta.keywords: Canarian consultancy, online consultancy, Gran Tarajal, labor management, tax, accounting, CIE Asesoría

technology.title: Technology at the service of
technology.description: Forget about paperwork and complex procedures. Our cloud platform allows you to have total control of your business from anywhere.

secureArea.title: Secure Client Area
secureArea.description: Access your documents, taxes and payroll 24/7 with maximum security.

realTime.title: Real-Time Information
realTime.description: View the status of your company with intuitive and updated graphs.

complaints.title: Complaints Channel
complaints.warning: Important: Please read the complaint management procedure carefully before accessing the channel
